name: NumberFormatter.RoundingMode
desc: These constants are used to specify how numbers should be rounded. These constants are used by the roundingMode property.

items.name: case halfEven
items.desc: Round towards the nearest integer, or towards an even number if equidistant.

items.name: case halfDown
items.desc: Round towards the nearest integer, or towards zero if equidistant.

items.name: case halfUp
items.desc: Round towards the nearest integer, or away from zero if equidistant.
